This is caused by a race condition during the creation of an UnchangedResourceModelElement. A superclass constructor is adding the object to a list of childen. This is then queryed by anothe rthread before the resource valriable is set. Since we can't modify the constructor, we need to make sure the race condition does not occur.
*** Bug 120834 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
The default sync view page is now the model-based sync. We have left the old sync code in for now but will remove it at some point in the future.
*** Bug 122887 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

This is happening in the old sync view framework which remains for backwards compatablity purposes. We'll leave this open to track the issue but we don't plan on addressing it.
